testcase.name: Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Logo Click Counter > should increment click counter on logo click
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Logo Click Counter > should reset click counter after 3 seconds of inactivity
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Logo Click Counter > should activate Easter egg on 5th consecutive click within 3 seconds
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Logo Click Counter > should not activate Easter egg if clicks are too slow
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > SessionStorage Persistence > should save activation state to sessionStorage
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > SessionStorage Persistence > should restore Easter egg state from sessionStorage on mount
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > SessionStorage Persistence > should not show Easter egg if sessionStorage is not set
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Visual Feedback > should apply glow effect when Easter egg is activated
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Visual Feedback > should apply brightness and scale on click
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Visual Feedback > should have cursor-pointer class to indicate clickability
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Login/Register Links Display > should render Sign In button when Easter egg is active
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Login/Register Links Display > should render Create Account button when Easter egg is active
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Login/Register Links Display > should navigate to /login when Sign In is clicked
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Login/Register Links Display > should navigate to /register when Create Account is clicked
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Login/Register Links Display > should have proper styling for login/register buttons
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Login/Register Links Display > should have fade-in animation on Easter egg links
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Keyboard Accessibility > should have tabIndex for keyboard navigation
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Keyboard Accessibility > should trigger Easter egg on Enter key press
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Keyboard Accessibility > should not trigger on other key presses
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Keyboard Accessibility > should have proper role and aria-label
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Keyboard Accessibility > should have focus ring styles on login/register buttons
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Responsive Design > should stack buttons vertically on mobile
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Responsive Design > should have responsive gap between buttons
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Integration with Existing Hero Features > should not interfere with email signup form rendering
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Integration with Existing Hero Features > should not interfere with headline rendering
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Integration with Existing Hero Features > should maintain logo alt text for accessibility
Hero Component - Easter Egg Feature > Integration with Existing Hero Features > should preserve existing logo responsive classes
Hero Component > Logo Rendering > should render the Legends Ascend logo
Hero Component > Logo Rendering > should have accessible alt text for the logo
Hero Component > Logo Rendering > should have responsive logo sizing classes
Hero Component > Logo Rendering > should center the logo horizontally
Hero Component > Content Structure > should render the main headline
Hero Component > Content Structure > should render the subheadline
Hero Component > Accessibility > should have proper heading hierarchy
Hero Component > Accessibility > should have decorative background elements hidden from screen readers
Hero Component > Responsive Design > should have full viewport height
Hero Component > Responsive Design > should have responsive padding
